pullrequest.title: Adding xacro parameter to specify task name in plugin

content.raw:
The phase2 worlds were in default.  Just merged default into this branch so they show up.

I changed the task names in dock?.world and scan\_and\_dock?.world so that the behavior is consistent with documentation.

The definition of `task_name` the the beginning of the `dock.xacro` file defines the default for the argument as `dock`.  Each of the world files includes a specific task name.
content.html:
The phase2 worlds were in default. Just merged default into this branch so they show up.

I changed the task names in dock?.world and scan_and_dock?.world so that the behavior is consistent with documentation.

The definition of task_name the the beginning of the dock.xacro file defines the default for the argument as dock. Each of the world files includes a specific task name.
